test_cases.summary: Verify UI of Privacy & Security Page
preconditions: User must be logged into Nucleus.
User must navigate to Privacy & Security Page.

test_steps.step: Verify the page title and header text.
test_steps.Test Result: The page title should be 'Privacy & Security' and the header should match it.

test_steps.step: Check if all sections are visible.
test_steps.Test Result: All sections should be correctly displayed.

preconditions: User must be on the login page.

test_steps.Test Result: User should be logged in successfully.
An error message should be displayed.
